patthana16.36:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.36:0.3_0: And there are ten kinds of plants propagated from seeds.
patthana16.36:1.1_0: Because of their little gratification, they don’t cause the reason for the sake of themselves.
patthana16.36:2.1_0: None whose teaching doesn’t arise for the sake of limited period.
